bill.title: Preserving Access to Rural Independent Pharmacies
bill.description: Concerning measures to preserve health-care access provided by rural independent pharmacies.

history.action: Introduced In House - Assigned to Health & Human Services
House Committee on Health & Human Services Refer Amended to House Committee of the Whole
House Second Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
House Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
House Third Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
House Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Introduced In Senate - Assigned to Health & Human Services
Senate Committee on Health & Human Services Refer Amended - Consent Calendar to Senate Committee of the Whole
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee
Senate Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Laid Over Daily
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Signed by the Speaker of the House
Signed by the President of the Senate

votes.desc: House Health & Human Services: Adopt amendment L.002 (Attachment C).
House Health & Human Services: Adopt amendment L.003 (Attachment D).
House Health & Human Services: Adopt amendment L.006 (Attachment E).
House Health & Human Services: Adopt amendment L.009 (Attachment F).
House Health & Human Services: Reconsider L.006 (Attachment E).
House Health & Human Services: Refer House Bill 25-1222, as amended, to the Committee of the Whole.
Senate Health & Human Services: Adopt amendment L.016 (Attachment I).
Senate Health & Human Services: Adopt amendment L.017 (Attachment J).
Senate Health & Human Services: Refer House Bill 25-1222, as amended, to the Committee of the Whole and with a recommendation that it be placed on the consent calendar.
